description.value:
Barathus respect and protect the Dreamers of @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.setting.ac6z5Rqyx0oLzvVf]{Liavara}, but few modify themselves to follow the Dreamers’ path. Those who do gain a hint of the Dreamers’ telepathic powers but forever lose the ability to modify themselves further. A barathu who selects this alternate racial trait cannot retrain it as it can others.

You gain the following spell-like abilities.

  • At will @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.spells.cmD9XPyg0Cud1xYO]{Daze}, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.spells.R6MvvYVPDf21fE8Y]{Telepathic Message}
  • 1/day @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.spells.c8FSuYsLfYviJYYF]{Mindlink}, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.spells.7XJ6x5BZv1k1eBBz]{Mind Thrust}(1st level)

 This replaces early stage adaptation.
